sqlList.sql: select CITY_ID AS CITYID, area_id AS areaid, name_cn AS name_zh, name_en, name_cn AS CITYNM from t_lm_b_city order by pinyin
select prop as HOTELID ,prop_name_zh as HOTELNM from t_lm_b_prop t order by prop
select group_code as GROUPCODE,name_zh as GROUPNM from t_lm_b_hotelgroup t order by id
select id AS USERGROUPID, usergroup_name AS USERGROUPNM from t_lm_usergroup t order by id
select ROOM_CODE AS HOTELROOMCODE,ROOM_NAME AS HOTELROOMNM from t_room t where HOTEL_ID=:HOTELID
select id from t_lm_promotionmsg t where pro_title=:TITLE

select tlp.pro_title, '' as ERRMSG from t_lm_promotionmsg tlp left join t_lm_promotionmsg_detail tlpd on tlp.id=tlpd.promotionmsg_id and tlpd.status='1' and tlpd.pro_type <> 5 where (((tlp.start_date <= to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.end_date)) OR ((tlp.start_date <= to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.end_date)) OR ((to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.start_date) and (tlp.end_date <= to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss'))) OR ((tlp.start_date <= to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.end_date))) AND tlp.priority=:PRIORITY AND tlpd.pro_type=:PROTYPE AND tlp.status='1' AND (:HOTELID IS NULL) AND (:COMMONLIST IS NULL) AND tlp.pro_title<>:TITLE

select tt.pro_title, wm_concat(cc.commlist) as ERRMSG from ( select tlp.id,tlp.start_date, tlp.end_date, tlp.pro_title, tlp.priority, tlp.status,tlpd.pro_type,tlpd.city_id,tlpd.hotelgroup_id,tlpd.hotel_id,tlpd.room_id from t_lm_promotionmsg tlp left join t_lm_promotionmsg_detail tlpd on tlp.id=tlpd.promotionmsg_id and tlpd.status='1' and tlpd.pro_type <> 5 where (((tlp.start_date <= to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.end_date)) OR ((tlp.start_date <= to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.end_date)) OR ((to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.start_date) and (tlp.end_date <= to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss'))) OR ((tlp.start_date <= to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.end_date))) AND tlp.priority=:PRIORITY AND tlpd.pro_type=:PROTYPE AND tlp.status='1' AND (:HOTELID IS NULL) AND tlp.pro_title<>:TITLE) tt inner join ( SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR (:COMMONLIST, '[^,]+', 1,rownum) AS commlist FROM DUAL CONNECT BY ROWNUM <= LENGTH (:COMMONLIST) - LENGTH (REPLACE (:COMMONLIST, ',', ''))) cc on cc.commlist = tt.city_id group by tt.pro_title

select tt.pro_title, wm_concat(cc.commlist) as ERRMSG from ( select tlp.id,tlp.start_date, tlp.end_date, tlp.pro_title, tlp.priority, tlp.status,tlpd.pro_type,tlpd.city_id,tlpd.hotelgroup_id,tlpd.hotel_id,tlpd.room_id from t_lm_promotionmsg tlp left join t_lm_promotionmsg_detail tlpd on tlp.id=tlpd.promotionmsg_id and tlpd.status='1' and tlpd.pro_type <> 5 where (((tlp.start_date <= to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.end_date)) OR ((tlp.start_date <= to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.end_date)) OR ((to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.start_date) and (tlp.end_date <= to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss'))) OR ((tlp.start_date <= to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.end_date))) AND tlp.priority=:PRIORITY AND tlpd.pro_type=:PROTYPE AND tlp.status='1' AND (:HOTELID IS NULL) AND tlp.pro_title<>:TITLE) tt inner join ( SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR (:COMMONLIST, '[^,]+', 1,rownum) AS commlist FROM DUAL CONNECT BY ROWNUM <= LENGTH (:COMMONLIST) - LENGTH (REPLACE (:COMMONLIST, ',', ''))) cc on cc.commlist = tt.hotelgroup_id group by tt.pro_title

select tt.pro_title, wm_concat(cc.commlist) as ERRMSG from ( select tlp.id,tlp.start_date, tlp.end_date, tlp.pro_title, tlp.priority, tlp.status,tlpd.pro_type,tlpd.city_id,tlpd.hotelgroup_id,tlpd.hotel_id,tlpd.room_id from t_lm_promotionmsg tlp left join t_lm_promotionmsg_detail tlpd on tlp.id=tlpd.promotionmsg_id and tlpd.status='1' and tlpd.pro_type <> 5 where (((tlp.start_date <= to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.end_date)) OR ((tlp.start_date <= to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.end_date)) OR ((to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.start_date) and (tlp.end_date <= to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss'))) OR ((tlp.start_date <= to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.end_date))) AND tlp.priority=:PRIORITY AND tlpd.pro_type=:PROTYPE AND tlp.status='1' AND (:HOTELID IS NULL) AND tlp.pro_title<>:TITLE) tt inner join ( SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR (:COMMONLIST, '[^,]+', 1,rownum) AS commlist FROM DUAL CONNECT BY ROWNUM <= LENGTH (:COMMONLIST) - LENGTH (REPLACE (:COMMONLIST, ',', ''))) cc on cc.commlist = tt.hotel_id group by tt.pro_title

select tt.pro_title, wm_concat(cc.commlist) as ERRMSG from ( select tlp.id,tlp.start_date, tlp.end_date, tlp.pro_title, tlp.priority, tlp.status,tlpd.pro_type,tlpd.city_id,tlpd.hotelgroup_id,tlpd.hotel_id,tlpd.room_id from t_lm_promotionmsg tlp left join t_lm_promotionmsg_detail tlpd on tlp.id=tlpd.promotionmsg_id and tlpd.status='1' and tlpd.pro_type <> 5 where (((tlp.start_date <= to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.end_date)) OR ((tlp.start_date <= to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.end_date)) OR ((to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.start_date) and (tlp.end_date <= to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss'))) OR ((tlp.start_date <= to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.end_date))) AND tlp.priority=:PRIORITY AND tlpd.pro_type=:PROTYPE AND tlp.status='1' AND tlpd.hotel_id=:HOTELID AND tlp.pro_title<>:TITLE) tt inner join ( SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR (:COMMONLIST, '[^,]+', 1,rownum) AS commlist FROM DUAL CONNECT BY ROWNUM <= LENGTH (:COMMONLIST) - LENGTH (REPLACE (:COMMONLIST, ',', ''))) cc on cc.commlist = tt.room_id group by tt.pro_title
select id from t_lm_promotionmsg t where pro_title=:TITLE AND id <> :ID

insert into t_lm_promotionmsg (id, start_date, end_date, pro_title, priority, pro_content, rate_code, pro_image_id, status, create_time, update_time, operate_user,pro_method_id) values (:ID, TO_DATE(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss'), TO_DATE(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss'), :TITLE , :PRIORITY, :CONTENT, :RATECODE,:IMAGEID, '0', sysdate, sysdate, :OPERATEUSER,:PROMETHODID)

update t_lm_promotionmsg set start_date=TO_DATE(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss'),end_date=TO_DATE(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss'), pro_title=:TITLE ,priority=:PRIORITY, pro_content=:CONTENT,rate_code=:RATECODE,pro_image_id=:IMAGEID,status=:STATUS,update_time=sysdate,operate_user= :OPERATEUSER,pro_method_id=:PROMETHODID where id=:ID
update t_lm_promotionmsg_detail set status = '0',update_time=sysdate where promotionmsg_id = :ID and status <> '0'

insert into t_lm_promotionmsg_detail (id, promotionmsg_id, pro_type, city_id, hotel_id, status, create_time, update_time, LINK_URL) SELECT t_lm_promotionmsg_detail_seq.nextval, :ID,:PROTYPE,:COMMONLIST AS city_id,:HOTELID, '1',sysdate, sysdate, :LINKURL FROM DUAL

insert into t_lm_promotionmsg_detail (id, promotionmsg_id, pro_type, city_id, hotel_id, status, create_time, update_time, LINK_URL) SELECT t_lm_promotionmsg_detail_seq.nextval, :ID,:PROTYPE,REGEXP_SUBSTR (:COMMONLIST, '[^,]+', 1,rownum) AS city_id, :HOTELID , '1',sysdate, sysdate, :LINKURL FROM DUAL CONNECT BY ROWNUM <= LENGTH (:COMMONLIST) - LENGTH (REPLACE (:COMMONLIST, ',', ''))

insert into t_lm_promotionmsg_detail (id, promotionmsg_id, pro_type, hotelgroup_id, hotel_id, status, create_time, update_time, LINK_URL) SELECT t_lm_promotionmsg_detail_seq.nextval, :ID,:PROTYPE,REGEXP_SUBSTR (:COMMONLIST, '[^,]+', 1,rownum) AS hotelgroup_id, :HOTELID , '1',sysdate, sysdate, :LINKURL FROM DUAL CONNECT BY ROWNUM <= LENGTH (:COMMONLIST) - LENGTH (REPLACE (:COMMONLIST, ',', ''))

insert into t_lm_promotionmsg_detail (id, promotionmsg_id, pro_type, hotelgroup_id, hotel_id, status, create_time, update_time, LINK_URL) SELECT t_lm_promotionmsg_detail_seq.nextval, :ID,:PROTYPE, :HOTELID ,REGEXP_SUBSTR (:COMMONLIST, '[^,]+', 1,rownum) AS hotel_id, '1',sysdate, sysdate, :LINKURL FROM DUAL CONNECT BY ROWNUM <= LENGTH (:COMMONLIST) - LENGTH (REPLACE (:COMMONLIST, ',', ''))

insert into t_lm_promotionmsg_detail (id, promotionmsg_id, pro_type, hotel_id, room_id,status, create_time, update_time, LINK_URL) SELECT t_lm_promotionmsg_detail_seq.nextval, :ID,:PROTYPE, :HOTELID ,REGEXP_SUBSTR (:COMMONLIST, '[^,]+', 1,rownum) AS room_id, '1',sysdate, sysdate, :LINKURL FROM DUAL CONNECT BY ROWNUM <= LENGTH (:COMMONLIST) - LENGTH (REPLACE (:COMMONLIST, ',', ''))

insert into t_lm_promotionmsg_detail (id, promotionmsg_id, pro_type, usergroup_id, status, create_time, update_time, LINK_URL)
SELECT t_lm_promotionmsg_detail_seq.nextval, :ID,:PROTYPE,REGEXP_SUBSTR (:USERGROUPLIST, '[^,]+', 1,rownum) AS usergroup_id, '1',sysdate, sysdate, :LINKURL FROM DUAL CONNECT BY ROWNUM <= LENGTH (:USERGROUPLIST) - LENGTH (REPLACE (:USERGROUPLIST, ',', ''))

select tlp.ID, tlp.pro_title AS PROTITLE,tlp.start_date AS STARTDATE, tlp.end_date AS ENDDATE, (CASE tlp.status WHEN '0' THEN '下线' WHEN '1' THEN '上线' ELSE '' END ) as ONLINEDIS, (CASE tpd.pro_type WHEN '0' THEN '全局促销' WHEN '1' THEN '城市促销' WHEN '2' THEN '酒店集团促销' WHEN '3' THEN '酒店促销' WHEN '4' THEN '房型促销' ELSE '' END ) as PROTYPENM, '编辑' AS MODIFYFIELD,tlp.RATE_CODE AS RATECODE from t_lm_promotionmsg tlp left join (select promotionmsg_id, pro_type from t_lm_promotionmsg_detail where pro_type <> '5' and status = '1' group by promotionmsg_id, pro_type) tpd on tlp.id = tpd.promotionmsg_id where tlp.status='1' AND (to_date(to_char(tlp.start_date, 'yyyy/mm/dd'), 'yyyy/mm/dd') <= to_date(to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy/mm/dd'), 'yyyy/mm/dd')) AND (to_date(to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy/mm/dd'), 'yyyy/mm/dd')<=to_date(to_char(tlp.end_date, 'yyyy/mm/dd'), 'yyyy/mm/dd')) order by end_date asc

select tlp.ID, tlp.pro_title AS PROTITLE,tlp.start_date AS STARTDATE, tlp.end_date AS ENDDATE, (CASE tlp.status WHEN '0' THEN '下线' WHEN '1' THEN '上线' ELSE '' END ) as ONLINEDIS, (CASE tpd.pro_type WHEN '0' THEN '全局促销' WHEN '1' THEN '城市促销' WHEN '2' THEN '酒店集团促销' WHEN '3' THEN '酒店促销' WHEN '4' THEN '房型促销' ELSE '' END ) as PROTYPENM, '编辑' AS MODIFYFIELD from t_lm_promotionmsg tlp left join (select promotionmsg_id, pro_type from t_lm_promotionmsg_detail where pro_type <> '5' and status = '1' group by promotionmsg_id, pro_type) tpd on tlp.id = tpd.promotionmsg_id where ((:ProTitle IS NULL) OR (tlp.pro_title LIKE '%'||:ProTitle||'%')) AND ((:StartBeginDTime IS NULL) OR (to_date(:StartBeginDTime, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.start_date)) AND ((:StartEndDTime IS NULL) OR (tlp.start_date <= to_date(:StartEndDTime, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss'))) AND ((:EndBeginDTime IS NULL) OR (to_date(:EndBeginDTime, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.end_date)) AND ((:EndEndDTime IS NULL) OR (tlp.end_date <= to_date(:EndEndDTime, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss'))) order by tlp.id desc

select tlp.ID, tlp.pro_title AS PROTITLE,to_char(tlp.start_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS STARTDATE, to_char(tlp.end_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS ENDDATE, tlp.STATUS, tpd.pro_type AS PROTYPE, tlp.PRIORITY, tlp.pro_content AS CONTENT, tlp.RATE_CODE AS RATECODE, tlp.pro_image_id AS IMAGEID, tbi.HTP_PATH AS IMAGEPATH, tlp.PRO_METHOD_ID from t_lm_promotionmsg tlp left join (select promotionmsg_id, pro_type from t_lm_promotionmsg_detail where pro_type <> '5' and status = '1' group by promotionmsg_id, pro_type) tpd on tlp.id = tpd.promotionmsg_id left join t_image tbi on tlp.pro_image_id = tbi.id where tlp.ID =:ID

select wm_concat(tlpd.city_id) AS CITY_ID, wm_concat(tlpd.hotelgroup_id) AS HOTELGROUP_ID, wm_concat(tlpd.hotel_id) AS HOTEL_ID, wm_concat(tlpd.room_id) AS ROOM_ID, wm_concat(tlc.cityid) AS CITYID, wm_concat(tlg.hotelgroupid) AS HOTELGROUPID, wm_concat(tbp.hotelid) AS HOTELID, wm_concat(ftr.roomid) AS ROOMID, wm_concat(tlup.usergroupid) AS USERGROUPID,wm_concat(tlpd.link_url) AS LINKURL from t_lm_promotionmsg_detail tlpd left join (select city_id,'['||city_id||']'||name_cn AS cityid from t_lm_b_city) tlc on tlc.city_id = tlpd.city_id left join (select group_code,'['||group_code||']'||name_zh AS hotelgroupid from t_lm_b_hotelgroup) tlg on tlg.group_code = tlpd.hotelgroup_id left join (select prop, '['||prop||']'||prop_name_zh AS hotelid from T_LM_B_PROP) tbp on tbp.prop = tlpd.hotel_id left join (select HOTEL_ID AS prop, ROOM_CODE AS ROOM_ID, '['||ROOM_CODE||']'||ROOM_NAME AS roomid from t_room) ftr on ftr.prop=tlpd.hotel_id and ftr.ROOM_ID=tlpd.room_id left join (select ID, '['||ID||']'||USERGROUP_NAME AS usergroupid from t_lm_usergroup) tlup on tlup.ID = tlpd.usergroup_id where tlpd.promotionmsg_id=:ID and tlpd.status='1'
insert into t_lm_b_images (id, title, IMG_TYPE, htp_path, dns_path, status, create_time, update_time, operate_user) values (:ID, :TITLE, '01',:PATH, :PATH, '1', sysdate, sysdate, :OPERATEUSER)

insert into t_image (id, title, img_type, htp_path, dns_path, source, is_cover, hotel_id, extend, is_process, resolution, room_type_code, create_time, update_time, seq, status, htp_path_bak) values (:ID, :TITLE, '3', :PATH, '', 'HVP', '0', '', '', '1', '', '', sysdate, sysdate, 0, '1', '')
update t_lm_b_images set title =:TITLE, htp_path = :PATH, dns_path = :PATH, update_time = sysdate, operate_user = :OPERATEUSER where id = :ID
update t_image set title =:TITLE, htp_path = :PATH, update_time = sysdate where id = :ID

select wm_concat(CITY_ID) AS CITYID, wm_concat(HOTELGROUP_ID) AS HOTELGROUPID, wm_concat(HOTEL_ID) AS HOTELID, wm_concat(ROOM_ID) AS ROOMID, wm_concat(USERGROUP_ID) AS USERGROUPID from t_lm_promotionmsg_detail t where PROMOTIONMSG_ID=:ID and status='1'
select tpd.promotionmsg_id, tpd.pro_type, tpd.city_id, tpd.hotelgroup_id, tpd.hotel_id, tpd.room_id, tpd.usergroup_id from t_lm_promotionmsg tlp left join (select promotionmsg_id, pro_type, city_id, hotelgroup_id, hotel_id, room_id, usergroup_id from t_lm_promotionmsg_detail where status='1') tpd on tlp.id = tpd.promotionmsg_id where tlp.ID =:ID order by tpd.pro_type asc
update t_lm_promotion set status = '0' where promotionmsg_id = :ID

insert into t_lm_promotion (id, start_date, end_date, hotel_id, room_type_code, rate_code, pro_desc, pro_content, pro_type, create_time, update_time, operate_user, priority, pro_image_id, status, usergroup, promotionmsg_id,pro_method_id,LINK_URL) select t_lm_promotion_seq.nextval,TO_DATE(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss'), TO_DATE(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss'), :HOTELID,:COMMONLIST,:RATECODE,:TITLE,:CONTENT,:PROTYPE,Sysdate,Sysdate,:OPERATEUSER,:PRIORITY,:IMAGEID,:STATUS,:USERGROUPLIST,:ID,:PROMETHODID,:LINKURL from dual

insert into t_lm_promotion (id, start_date, end_date, hotel_id, rate_code, pro_desc, pro_content, pro_type, create_time, update_time, operate_user, priority, pro_image_id, status, usergroup, city_id, promotionmsg_id,pro_method_id,LINK_URL) select t_lm_promotion_seq.nextval,TO_DATE(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss'), TO_DATE(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss'), :HOTELID,:RATECODE,:TITLE,:CONTENT,:PROTYPE,Sysdate,Sysdate,:OPERATEUSER,:PRIORITY,:IMAGEID,:STATUS,:USERGROUPLIST,REGEXP_SUBSTR (:COMMONLIST, '[^,]+', 1,rownum) AS city_id,:ID,:PROMETHODID,:LINKURL from dual CONNECT BY ROWNUM <= LENGTH (:COMMONLIST) - LENGTH (REPLACE (:COMMONLIST, ',', ''))

insert into t_lm_promotion (id, start_date, end_date, hotel_id, rate_code, pro_desc, pro_content, pro_type, create_time, update_time, operate_user, priority, pro_image_id, status, usergroup, hotelgroup_id, promotionmsg_id,pro_method_id,LINK_URL) select t_lm_promotion_seq.nextval,TO_DATE(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss'), TO_DATE(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss'), :HOTELID,:RATECODE,:TITLE,:CONTENT,:PROTYPE,Sysdate,Sysdate,:OPERATEUSER,:PRIORITY,:IMAGEID,:STATUS,:USERGROUPLIST,REGEXP_SUBSTR (:COMMONLIST, '[^,]+', 1,rownum) AS hotelgroup_id,:ID,:PROMETHODID,:LINKURL from dual CONNECT BY ROWNUM <= LENGTH (:COMMONLIST) - LENGTH (REPLACE (:COMMONLIST, ',', ''))

insert into t_lm_promotion (id, start_date, end_date, hotel_id, rate_code, pro_desc, pro_content, pro_type, create_time, update_time, operate_user, priority, pro_image_id, status, usergroup, hotelgroup_id, promotionmsg_id,pro_method_id,LINK_URL) select t_lm_promotion_seq.nextval,TO_DATE(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss'), TO_DATE(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss'), REGEXP_SUBSTR (:COMMONLIST, '[^,]+', 1,rownum) AS hotel_id,:RATECODE,:TITLE,:CONTENT,:PROTYPE,Sysdate,Sysdate,:OPERATEUSER,:PRIORITY,:IMAGEID,:STATUS,:USERGROUPLIST,:HOTELID,:ID,:PROMETHODID,:LINKURL from dual CONNECT BY ROWNUM <= LENGTH (:COMMONLIST) - LENGTH (REPLACE (:COMMONLIST, ',', ''))

insert into t_lm_promotion (id, start_date, end_date, hotel_id, room_type_code, rate_code, pro_desc, pro_content, pro_type, create_time, update_time, operate_user, priority, pro_image_id, status, usergroup, promotionmsg_id,pro_method_id,LINK_URL) select t_lm_promotion_seq.nextval,TO_DATE(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss'), TO_DATE(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss'), :HOTELID,REGEXP_SUBSTR (:COMMONLIST, '[^,]+', 1,rownum) AS room_type_code,:RATECODE,:TITLE,:CONTENT,:PROTYPE,Sysdate,Sysdate,:OPERATEUSER,:PRIORITY,:IMAGEID,:STATUS,:USERGROUPLIST,:ID,:PROMETHODID,:LINKURL from dual CONNECT BY ROWNUM <= LENGTH (:COMMONLIST) - LENGTH (REPLACE (:COMMONLIST, ',', ''))

select tlp.pro_title, '' as ERRMSG from t_lm_promotionmsg tlp left join t_lm_promotionmsg_detail tlpd on tlp.id=tlpd.promotionmsg_id and tlpd.status='1' and tlpd.pro_type <> 5 where (((tlp.start_date <= to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.end_date)) OR ((tlp.start_date <= to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.end_date)) OR ((to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.start_date) and (tlp.end_date <= to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss'))) OR ((tlp.start_date <= to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.end_date))) AND tlp.priority=:PRIORITY AND tlpd.pro_type=:PROTYPE AND tlp.status='1' AND (:HOTELID IS NULL) AND (:COMMONLIST IS NULL) AND tlp.pro_title<>:TITLE AND tlp.id<>:ID

select tt.pro_title, wm_concat(cc.commlist) as ERRMSG from ( select tlp.id,tlp.start_date, tlp.end_date, tlp.pro_title, tlp.priority, tlp.status,tlpd.pro_type,tlpd.city_id,tlpd.hotelgroup_id,tlpd.hotel_id,tlpd.room_id from t_lm_promotionmsg tlp left join t_lm_promotionmsg_detail tlpd on tlp.id=tlpd.promotionmsg_id and tlpd.status='1' and tlpd.pro_type <> 5 where (((tlp.start_date <= to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.end_date)) OR ((tlp.start_date <= to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.end_date)) OR ((to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.start_date) and (tlp.end_date <= to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss'))) OR ((tlp.start_date <= to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.end_date))) AND tlp.priority=:PRIORITY AND tlpd.pro_type=:PROTYPE AND tlp.status='1' AND (:HOTELID IS NULL) AND tlp.pro_title<>:TITLE AND tlp.id<>:ID) tt inner join ( SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR (:COMMONLIST, '[^,]+', 1,rownum) AS commlist FROM DUAL CONNECT BY ROWNUM <= LENGTH (:COMMONLIST) - LENGTH (REPLACE (:COMMONLIST, ',', ''))) cc on cc.commlist = tt.city_id OR tt.city_id='000000' group by tt.pro_title

select tt.pro_title, '' as ERRMSG from ( select tlp.id,tlp.start_date, tlp.end_date, tlp.pro_title, tlp.priority, tlp.status,tlpd.pro_type,tlpd.city_id,tlpd.hotelgroup_id,tlpd.hotel_id,tlpd.room_id from t_lm_promotionmsg tlp left join t_lm_promotionmsg_detail tlpd on tlp.id=tlpd.promotionmsg_id and tlpd.status='1' and tlpd.pro_type <> 5 where (((tlp.start_date <= to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.end_date)) OR ((tlp.start_date <= to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.end_date)) OR ((to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.start_date) and (tlp.end_date <= to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss'))) OR ((tlp.start_date <= to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.end_date))) AND tlp.priority=:PRIORITY AND tlpd.pro_type=:PROTYPE AND tlp.status='1' AND (:HOTELID IS NULL) AND tlp.pro_title<>:TITLE AND tlp.id<>:ID AND :COMMONLIST IS NULL) tt group by tt.pro_title

select tt.pro_title, wm_concat(cc.commlist) as ERRMSG from ( select tlp.id,tlp.start_date, tlp.end_date, tlp.pro_title, tlp.priority, tlp.status,tlpd.pro_type,tlpd.city_id,tlpd.hotelgroup_id,tlpd.hotel_id,tlpd.room_id from t_lm_promotionmsg tlp left join t_lm_promotionmsg_detail tlpd on tlp.id=tlpd.promotionmsg_id and tlpd.status='1' and tlpd.pro_type <> 5 where (((tlp.start_date <= to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.end_date)) OR ((tlp.start_date <= to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.end_date)) OR ((to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.start_date) and (tlp.end_date <= to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss'))) OR ((tlp.start_date <= to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.end_date))) AND tlp.priority=:PRIORITY AND tlpd.pro_type=:PROTYPE AND tlp.status='1' AND (:HOTELID IS NULL) AND tlp.pro_title<>:TITLE AND tlp.id<>:ID) tt inner join ( SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR (:COMMONLIST, '[^,]+', 1,rownum) AS commlist FROM DUAL CONNECT BY ROWNUM <= LENGTH (:COMMONLIST) - LENGTH (REPLACE (:COMMONLIST, ',', ''))) cc on cc.commlist = tt.hotelgroup_id OR tt.hotelgroup_id='000000' group by tt.pro_title

select tt.pro_title, '' as ERRMSG from ( select tlp.id,tlp.start_date, tlp.end_date, tlp.pro_title, tlp.priority, tlp.status,tlpd.pro_type,tlpd.city_id,tlpd.hotelgroup_id,tlpd.hotel_id,tlpd.room_id from t_lm_promotionmsg tlp left join t_lm_promotionmsg_detail tlpd on tlp.id=tlpd.promotionmsg_id and tlpd.status='1' and tlpd.pro_type <> 5 where (((tlp.start_date <= to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.end_date)) OR ((tlp.start_date <= to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.end_date)) OR ((to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.start_date) and (tlp.end_date <= to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss'))) OR ((tlp.start_date <= to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.end_date))) AND tlp.priority=:PRIORITY AND tlpd.pro_type=:PROTYPE AND tlp.status='1' AND (:HOTELID IS NULL) AND tlp.pro_title<>:TITLE AND tlp.id<>:ID AND :COMMONLIST IS NULL) tt group by tt.pro_title

select tt.pro_title, wm_concat(cc.commlist) as ERRMSG from ( select tlp.id,tlp.start_date, tlp.end_date, tlp.pro_title, tlp.priority, tlp.status,tlpd.pro_type,tlpd.city_id,tlpd.hotelgroup_id,tlpd.hotel_id,tlpd.room_id from t_lm_promotionmsg tlp left join t_lm_promotionmsg_detail tlpd on tlp.id=tlpd.promotionmsg_id and tlpd.status='1' and tlpd.pro_type <> 5 where (((tlp.start_date <= to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.end_date)) OR ((tlp.start_date <= to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.end_date)) OR ((to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.start_date) and (tlp.end_date <= to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss'))) OR ((tlp.start_date <= to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.end_date))) AND tlp.priority=:PRIORITY AND tlpd.pro_type=:PROTYPE AND tlp.status='1' AND (:HOTELID IS NULL) AND tlp.pro_title<>:TITLE AND tlp.id<>:ID) tt inner join ( SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR (:COMMONLIST, '[^,]+', 1,rownum) AS commlist FROM DUAL CONNECT BY ROWNUM <= LENGTH (:COMMONLIST) - LENGTH (REPLACE (:COMMONLIST, ',', ''))) cc on cc.commlist = tt.hotel_id OR tt.hotel_id='000000' group by tt.pro_title

select tt.pro_title, '' as ERRMSG from ( select tlp.id,tlp.start_date, tlp.end_date, tlp.pro_title, tlp.priority, tlp.status,tlpd.pro_type,tlpd.city_id,tlpd.hotelgroup_id,tlpd.hotel_id,tlpd.room_id from t_lm_promotionmsg tlp left join t_lm_promotionmsg_detail tlpd on tlp.id=tlpd.promotionmsg_id and tlpd.status='1' and tlpd.pro_type <> 5 where (((tlp.start_date <= to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.end_date)) OR ((tlp.start_date <= to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.end_date)) OR ((to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.start_date) and (tlp.end_date <= to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss'))) OR ((tlp.start_date <= to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.end_date))) AND tlp.priority=:PRIORITY AND tlpd.pro_type=:PROTYPE AND tlp.status='1' AND (:HOTELID IS NULL) AND tlp.pro_title<>:TITLE AND tlp.id<>:ID AND :COMMONLIST IS NULL) tt group by tt.pro_title

select tt.pro_title, wm_concat(cc.commlist) as ERRMSG from ( select tlp.id,tlp.start_date, tlp.end_date, tlp.pro_title, tlp.priority, tlp.status,tlpd.pro_type,tlpd.city_id,tlpd.hotelgroup_id,tlpd.hotel_id,tlpd.room_id from t_lm_promotionmsg tlp left join t_lm_promotionmsg_detail tlpd on tlp.id=tlpd.promotionmsg_id and tlpd.status='1' and tlpd.pro_type <> 5 where (((tlp.start_date <= to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.end_date)) OR ((tlp.start_date <= to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.end_date)) OR ((to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.start_date) and (tlp.end_date <= to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss'))) OR ((tlp.start_date <= to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.end_date))) AND tlp.priority=:PRIORITY AND tlpd.pro_type=:PROTYPE AND tlp.status='1' AND (tlpd.hotel_id=:HOTELID OR tlpd.hotel_id='000000') AND tlp.pro_title<>:TITLE AND tlp.id<>:ID) tt inner join ( SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR (:COMMONLIST, '[^,]+', 1,rownum) AS commlist FROM DUAL CONNECT BY ROWNUM <= LENGTH (:COMMONLIST) - LENGTH (REPLACE (:COMMONLIST, ',', ''))) cc on cc.commlist = tt.room_id OR tt.room_id='000000' group by tt.pro_title

select tt.pro_title, '' as ERRMSG from ( select tlp.id,tlp.start_date, tlp.end_date, tlp.pro_title, tlp.priority, tlp.status,tlpd.pro_type,tlpd.city_id,tlpd.hotelgroup_id,tlpd.hotel_id,tlpd.room_id from t_lm_promotionmsg tlp left join t_lm_promotionmsg_detail tlpd on tlp.id=tlpd.promotionmsg_id and tlpd.status='1' and tlpd.pro_type <> 5 where (((tlp.start_date <= to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.end_date)) OR ((tlp.start_date <= to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.end_date)) OR ((to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.start_date) and (tlp.end_date <= to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss'))) OR ((tlp.start_date <= to_date(:STARTDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (to_date(:ENDDTIME, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi:ss') <= tlp.end_date))) AND tlp.priority=:PRIORITY AND tlpd.pro_type=:PROTYPE AND tlp.status='1' AND :HOTELID IS NULL AND tlp.pro_title<>:TITLE AND tlp.id<>:ID AND :COMMONLIST IS NULL) tt group by tt.pro_title
select * from t_lm_promotion_method where (:NAME IS NULL OR NAME like '%'||:NAME||'%') order by seq asc
insert into t_lm_promotion_method (ID,NAME,SEQ) VALUES(:ID,:NAME,:SEQ)
UPDATE t_lm_promotion_method SET NAME=:NAME, SEQ=:SEQ WHERE ID=:ID
DELETE t_lm_promotion_method WHERE ID=:ID
select * from (select seq from t_lm_promotion_method where seq is not null order by seq desc) where rownum<=1
select 'http://images.hubs1.net/images/'||uploadimagename as picPath,uploadimagename from t_image where prop = :HOTELID and isdefault = 'Y' and rownum = 1

select picPath,uploadimagename from ( select 'http://images.hubs1.net/images/'||uploadimagename as picPath,uploadimagename from t_image where prop =:HOTELID and imagecatid in(6,7,1,5) order by decode(imagecatid,6,1,7,2,1,3,5,4) )where rownum = 1

select ' http://images.hubs1.net/jiudian/'|| floor(t.prop/1000) ||'/'||t.prop|| '/' || t.image || '.' || t.image_type "imageUrl",imagecatid as "imageCate",t.caption as "caption",t.uploadimagename as "uploadimagename" from t_image t where t.prop = :HOTELID and t.imagecatid in(6,7,1,5,8) order by decode(imagecatid,6,1,7,2,1,3,5,4,8,5)
